title: Scientists accidentally found life under 3,000 feet of ice in Antarctica. 'Never in a million years' would they have expected it, the lead scientist said.
content:
1. Scientists accidentally found life under 3,000 feet of ice in Antarctica. 'Never in a million years' would they have expected it, the lead scientist said.  Yahoo News
  2. Scientists Accidentally Discover Strange Creatures Under a Half Mile of Ice  WIRED
  3. Life found beneath Antarctic ice sheet 'shouldn't be there'  New Scientist
  4. Mystery Lifeforms Have Been Found in The Hostile Darkness Beneath Antarctica  ScienceAlert
  5. Strange life found on seafloor in the dark, beneath Antarctic ice shelf  Haaretz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 科学家在南极洲3000英尺的冰层下意外发现了生命。首席科学家说，"一百万年都不会想到"。
